name: Lilo Web Design
tagline: Lilo is an award-winning web development agency ba
description:
Lilo is an award winning web design agency delivering expert and cost effective solutions. Their service offerings include web design, usability, web development, e-Marketing, application development, e-Commerce, search engine optimisation (SEO), hosting and a range of other interactive products with a team that is made up of web designers, developers, analysts, strategists and project managers.

Besides web design and development, Lilo also offers a wide range of digital solution services.
